metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19889 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in the huffcodefunction (libfaac/huff2.c) in Freeware Advanced Audio Coder (FAAC)1.29.9.2. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault and applicationcrash, which leads to denial of service in the book 6 case.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19889` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

faac - 1.30-1
libfaac0 - 1.30-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: faac package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30-1').
